popover.primary: A mastery path focused on toe-to-toe combat
A mastery path focused on poisons and weakening effects
A mastery path focused on surprise attacks and positional combat

data.name: Agile Escape
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.
data.rawDescription: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to {ABIL_3032_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Agonizing Wound
data.description: A cruel attack to your target, which deals 177 damage. If you are behind your target, you ignore your target's armor.
data.rawDescription: A cruel attack to your target, which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}. If you are behind your target, you ignore your target's armor.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.
data.rawDescription: Spiritual resistance increased by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Mark of Morathi
data.description: You have been blessed by Morathi. Your Autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds after the successful use of any one of your Frenzies.
data.rawDescription: You have been blessed by Morathi. Your Autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds after the successful use of any one of your Frenzies.

data.name: Baneful Touch
data.description: Any time you attack an enemy from the sides or rear with an action, you will gain 15 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Any time you attack an enemy from the sides or rear with an action, you will gain {COM_1_VAL0} Action Points.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain {ABIL_3260_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3260_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Black Lotus Blade
data.description: A deadly strike which deals 202 damage to your target and infects them with Black Lotus toxin, causing all healing that they receive for the next 10 seconds to become 50% less effective.
data.rawDescription: A deadly strike which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and infects them with Black Lotus toxin, causing all healing that they receive for the next {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS} to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Blade Spin
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Broad Severing
data.description: Slice will now sweep out in an arc in front of you, striking up to an additional two enemies within 25 feet, but Slice will now do 10% less damage.
data.rawDescription: Slice will now sweep out in an arc in front of you, striking up to an additional two enemies within {ABIL_9398_COM_2_RADI_FEET}, but Slice will now do {COM_1_VAL1}% less damage.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dance of Doom
data.description: You concentrate on your target, repeatedly dealing 300 damage to them for up to 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You concentrate on your target, repeatedly dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to them for up to 3 seconds.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.
data.rawDescription: Direct heals cast on you will recover {COM_0_VAL1}% more health.

data.name: Death Reaper
data.description: Increases critical hit chance by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.
data.rawDescription: Increases critical hit chance by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Elixir of Insane Power
data.description:
A vile brew which drives you into a rage for the next 7 seconds. All of your attacks will ignore 50% of the victim's armor.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A vile brew which drives you into a rage for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. All of your attacks will ignore 50% of the victim's armor.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Elixir of Shadows
data.description:
You throw poison around you and the vapors blind your enemies. You will become invisible to enemies for 2 seconds and increase your speed by 50% for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.
data.rawDescription:
You throw poison around you and the vapors blind your enemies. You will become invisible to enemies for 2 seconds and increase your speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Elixir of the Cauldron
data.description:
A potion filled from the legendary Cauldron Of Blood which fills you with power, increasing your chance to disrupt enemy magic by 100% and resisting all spell damage for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.
data.rawDescription:
A potion filled from the legendary Cauldron Of Blood which fills you with power, increasing your chance to disrupt enemy magic by {COM_0_VAL0}% and resisting all spell damage for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Enchanting Beauty
data.description: Your unearthly Elven beauty Detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: Your unearthly Elven beauty Detaunts all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Enfeebling Strike
data.description: You ambush your target from the shadows and strike with a Crippling attack. Your target will take 75 Corporeal damage every time they move for 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.
data.rawDescription: You ambush your target from the shadows and strike with a Crippling attack. Your target will take {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} every time they move for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Your abilities will cost {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Enveloping Shadows
data.description: When leaving Shadow Prowler, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to 475 damage
data.rawDescription: When leaving Shadow Prowler, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to {ABIL_3004_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}

data.name: Envenomed Blade
data.description: You stab your enemy with a poisoned blade, dealing 101 damage.  The victim becomes wracked with pains, suffering an additional 216 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.  This effect will stack with itself up to three times.
data.rawDescription: You stab your enemy with a poisoned blade, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  The victim becomes wracked with pains, suffering an additional {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.  This effect will stack with itself up to three times.

data.name: Exotic Venom
data.description: Increases the durations of Vehement Blades, Enfeebling Strike, and Treacherous Assault by an additional 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the durations of Vehement Blades, Enfeebling Strike, and Treacherous Assault by an additional 5 seconds.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.
data.rawDescription: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fleet-Footed
data.description: Your swift footwork and quick thinking removes all roots and snares from you.  For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.
data.rawDescription: Your swift footwork and quick thinking removes all roots and snares from you.  For the next {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Fling Poison
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: For the Hag Queen!
data.description: Your Frenzies will now have a 10% chance per point spent to knock the enemy down for 4 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your Frenzies will now have a 10% chance per point spent to knock the enemy down for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You stare down your opponent, draining {COM_0_VAL0} of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by {COM_2_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Frenzied Mayhem
data.description: Increases the damage of your Frenzies by 5% for each Blood Lust point you have.
data.rawDescription: Increases the damage of your Frenzies by 5% for each Blood Lust point you have.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent

2 Blood Lust: 109 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 33.
3 Blood Lust: 131 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 41.
4 Blood Lust: 151 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 50.
5 Blood Lust: 172 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 58.

data.name: Heart Seeker
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A shocking strike which deals 277 damage and knocksdown your target for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A shocking strike which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocksdown your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Increased Pain
data.description: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.
data.rawDescription: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Corporeal damage over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Kiss of Agony
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to have their Initiative reduced by 50 for the next 10 seconds. You capitalize on their momentary weakness, causing your Initiative to be increased for the same amount during this time.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra {ABIL_3810_COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to have their Initiative reduced by {ABIL_3810_COM_0_VAL0} for the next {ABIL_3810_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You capitalize on their momentary weakness, causing your Initiative to be increased for the same amount during this time.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Betrayal
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to lose 20 Action Points. Seeing your enemy suffer causes you to gain as many Action Points as they have lost.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra {ABIL_3812_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to lose {ABIL_3812_COM_1_VAL0} Action Points. Seeing your enemy suffer causes you to gain as many Action Points as they have lost.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Death
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing all healing done by them to be reduced to 50% for the next 5 seconds.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.
data.rawDescription:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra {ABIL_3811_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing all healing done by them to be reduced to {ABIL_3811_COM_2_VAL1}% for the next {ABIL_3811_COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

You may apply Kisses while Shadow Prowling without dismissing the effect.

data.name: Kiss of Doom
data.description: Kiss of Death will now heal you for 150% of the damage it deals.
data.rawDescription: Kiss of Death will now heal you for 150% of the damage it deals.

data.name: Masterful Treachery

data.name: On Your Knees!
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You spin around and strike your target with a pair of quick, punishing attacks that knocks them down for 3 seconds, and does damage to your target an all enemies around them reducing their Morale by 125, inspired, your group gains 125 Morale.
1 Blood Lust: 92 damage per hit, 30 feet radius.
2 Blood Lust: 117 damage per hit, 35 feet radius.
3 Blood Lust: 143 damage per hit, 40 feet radius.
4 Blood Lust: 167 damage per hit, 43 feet radius.
5 Blood Lust: 192 damage per hit, 48 feet radius.

Your attack will snare the enemy if used behind your target, reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Treacherous Assault
data.description: You leap out at your target in a maddened battle craze, immediately gaining 2 Blood Lust. Your target will take 175 Corporeal damage every time they use a magical ability for 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You leap out at your target in a maddened battle craze, immediately gaining 2 Blood Lust. Your target will take {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} every time they use a magical ability for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Your abilities will cost {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Vehement Blades
data.description: You leap out of the shadows in an insane rage. Each time your target uses a melee ability, your target will take 125 Corporeal damage for each melee ability used over the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.
data.rawDescription: You leap out of the shadows in an insane rage. Each time your target uses a melee ability, your target will take {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} for each melee ability used over the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Your abilities will cost {ABIL_3009_COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {ABIL_3009_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Web of Shadows
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Whirling Blades
data.description: Your attacks which build Blood Lust will now have a 33% chance to build one additional Blood Lust.
data.rawDescription: Your attacks which build Blood Lust will now have a 33% chance to build one additional Blood Lust.

data.name: Witchbrew
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You consume a noxious liquid distilled from blood which fills you with power, causing your next several attacks to each deal an additional 300 Corporeal damage to your target.
1 Blood Lust: Lasts for 2 attacks.
2 Blood Lust: Lasts for 3 attacks.
3 Blood Lust: Lasts for 4 attacks.
4 Blood Lust: Lasts for 5 attacks.
5 Blood Lust: Lasts for 6 attacks.
data.rawDescription:
You consume a noxious liquid distilled from blood which fills you with power, causing your next several attacks to each deal an additional {ABIL_3621_COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target.
1 Blood Lust: Lasts for 2 attacks.
2 Blood Lust: Lasts for 3 attacks.
3 Blood Lust: Lasts for 4 attacks.
4 Blood Lust: Lasts for 5 attacks.
5 Blood Lust: Lasts for 6 attacks.

data.name: Wracking Pains
data.description: A brutal attack that deals 728 Corporeal damage to your target over 21 seconds.  If the target is Ailing, then their Toughness and Weapon Skill will also be reduced by 75 for 21 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A brutal attack that deals {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.  If the target is Ailing, then their Toughness and Weapon Skill will also be reduced by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive 25% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.
data.rawDescription: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive {ABIL_3080_COM_0_VAL1}% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.

data.name: Bleeding Edge
data.description: Your Armour Penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds after successful use of your Frenzies.
data.rawDescription: Your Armour Penetration is increased by 50% for 3 seconds after successful use of your Frenzies.

data.name: Bloody Inspiration
data.description: Your bloody fury inspires your group. Morale gain is doubled for 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your bloody fury inspires your group. Morale gain is doubled for 15 seconds.
